member.name: T:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine
member.summary:
A simple StringTemplateengine for .NET.
See for more details

member.name: P:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.OpeningDelimiter
member.summary: Beginning Char for a PlaceholderProperty. The Defaultvalue ist "${".

member.name: P:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.CloseingDelimiter
member.summary: Ending Char for a PlaceholderProperty. Der Default ist "}".

member.name: P:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.TemplateDataModel
member.summary: Model with propertys to fill ${PlaceholderPropertys} in the template. The propertynames at DataModel has to be equal with ${Placeholder}

member.name: P:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.NullStringValue
member.summary: Get or Set the string for NULL-Values. Default = NULL.

member.name: M:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.CreateStringFromTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all Propertys of templateDataModel in stringTemplate. The Popertynames from templateDataModel a the name of ${Placeholder} have to be equal. Example: public string MyProperty => ${MyProperty}

member.name: M:MbSoftLab.TemplateEngine.Core.TemplateEngine`1.CreateStringFromTemplate(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all Propertys of templateDataModel in stringTemplate. The Popertynames from templateDataModel a the name of ${Placeholder} have to be equal. Example: public string MyProperty => ${MyProperty}
